name: SenseCAP T1000 Tracker
description: SenseCAP T1000 is a compact LoRaWANÂ® tracker that utilizes GNSS/Wi-Fi/Bluetooth for precise indoor & outdoor location tracking. It boasts self-geo-adaptive capabilities, local data storage, and an impressive months of battery life. Additionally, it is equipped with temperature, light, and motion sensors, making it ideal for a variety of location-based applications.
author: Akenza AG
